data.sentence: The word أَنْ comes from the root ا ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (lana)To soften, make tender, lenient, gentle, smooth.linatun - apalm-tree of which the dates are of very inferior quality and are unfit for human consumption.
data.sentence: The word لَنْ comes from the root ل ن and is associated with the meanings: (lana)To soften, make tender, lenient, gentle, smooth.linatun - apalm-tree of which the dates are of very inferior quality and are unfit for human consumption.

data.meanings: make/call it one, unity, anyone/anything.ahada ashara (eleven).
data.sentence: The word أَحَدٌ comes from the root ا ح د and is associated with the meanings: make/call it one, unity, anyone/anything.ahada ashara (eleven).

data.meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.
data.sentence: The word أَيَحْسَبُ comes from the root ح س ب and is associated with the meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.

data.meanings: to measure/decree/determine/stint/straiten, to have power, to be able, a measure, means, ability, a term/decree, doom, destiny, measured, decreed.qudrun - knowledge, law, value, power, measure, majesty, ability, glory, honour, standard, limit, destiny. taqdir - knowledge, law, measuring decree, judgement, ordering. maqduran - made absolute, executed. miqdar - due measurement, definite quantity. qidr (pl. qudurun) - cooking pot. qaddara - to make possible, prepare, devise, lay plan, facilitate. muqtadir - powerful, able to prevail.
data.sentence: The word يَقْدِرَ comes from the root ق د ر and is associated with the meanings: to measure/decree/determine/stint/straiten, to have power, to be able, a measure, means, ability, a term/decree, doom, destiny, measured, decreed.qudrun - knowledge, law, value, power, measure, majesty, ability, glory, honour, standard, limit, destiny. taqdir - knowledge, law, measuring decree, judgement, ordering. maqduran - made absolute, executed. miqdar - due measurement, definite quantity. qidr (pl. qudurun) - cooking pot. qaddara - to make possible, prepare, devise, lay plan, facilitate. muqtadir - powerful, able to prevail.
